程序包 ride

类 Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • ride.Server
  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models the behavior of a real server, which is to handle the rent and the return(restore) of the bikes. This class uses the singleton pattern, since there should be only one (setting) of the server at a time.
    作者:
    SUNXIAOYU

      • rent

        public void rent​(User user,
                 Station station,
                 char bicycleType)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        A user try to rent a bicycle of a certain type.
        参数:
        user - The user who rents the bicycle.
        station - The station where the bicycle is rented.
        bicycleType - The type of bike the user wanted.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions when renting a bike

      • rent

        public void rent​(User user,
                 Station station)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        A user tries to rent a bike at station, where the type of bike does not matter.
        参数:
        user - The user who rents the bicycle.
        station - station to rent bike
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - rent bike exception

      • restore

        public void restore​(User user,
                    Station station)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    java.lang.Exception
        We suppose that by default the user will always return the bicycle that he just rented. The return time is the system time. That is why restore does not take Bicycle as an parameter. This might lead to prevent a bug, which a user might use two cards to alternate renting bikes at return everyone in an hour.?? *
        参数:
        user - The user who returns the bicycle.
        station - The station where the bicycle is returned.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - restore Exception
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - illegal input

                         java.lang.Exception
        抛出:

        java.lang.Exception
